thread.title: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like PSG vs. Barcelona | FOX Sports
thread.title_full: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like PSG vs. Barcelona | FOX Sports

author: Alex Dowd
title: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like PSG vs. Barcelona | FOX Sports
text:
Feb 10, 2017 at 4:02p ET 0Shares 
The Champions League round of 16 is upon us, and we can hear the tournament’s iconic theme song ringing already. Barcelona, Paris St. Germain, Borussia Dortmund and Benfica are all in action on Tuesday as the first legs of the round of 16 kick off. On Wednesday, Real Madrid, Napoli, Bayern Munich and Arsenal take the stage in Europe’s biggest tournament. 
Here are all the details you need to know to ensure you don’t miss a moment of the action. 
Fans can watch matches online or stream them on a mobile or home device using the FOX Sports GO and FOX Soccer 2GO apps, as well as on foxsportsgo.com . Streaming links for each individual match can be found below. 
Tuesday’s coverage begins with pregame show at 2 p.m. ET, simulcast on both FS1 and FS2. After that, PSG and Barcelona will square off at the Parc des Princes on FS1 at 2:30 p.m. ET . At the same time, Borussia Dortmund will host Benfica on FS2 . After the matches wrap up, stick around for postgame analysis and highlights. 
On Wednesday, the coverage follows suit. The pregame show begins at 2 p.m. ET on FS1 and FS2, with matches kicking off on both channels at 2:30 p.m. ET. Bayern Munich host Arsenal at the Allianz Arena on FS1, while Real Madrid and Napoli lock horns at the Santiago Bernabeu on FS2 . 
It’s a busy week, to be sure. Don’t miss out. 
Streaming links: 
PSG vs. Barcelona, Tuesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS1: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/doRRTAhYEA 
Borussia Dortmund vs. Benfica, Tuesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS2: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/Cue4WXhYEA 
Bayern Munich vs. Arsenal, Wednesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS1: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/FdsL5pAZEA 
Real Madrid vs. Napoli, Wednesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS2: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/Ma4eU5C0EA 0
